Good Comments: Better than most groups. The English sounds natural, and the translation is overall great. This guy obviously knows what he's doing.
Translation was your run-to-the-mill fansub quality. Not horrible, but few mistakes here and there. Minus for the inappropriate use of cursewords.
Its Good And its UnderstandableAlso the Timing is great as many subs
Horrible, half the time it seems he just made up lines for simple phrases, and got terms wrong.
Nothing was "made up." Many liberties were taken, however. Literal translations suck anyways.
Bad Comments:
The only group to sub the great series Legendary Gambler Tetsuya after it had been neglected and gone subless for a number of years. Plus, he's a 1-man translating, typesetting, & encoding operation at that.

Kudos for a job well done.
He subbed the hole thing in a short understandable way. Did you know that just one person did this? I am grateful to him.
The way they localized the speech was great. In most cases sprinkling profanity into the script isn't the way to go, but for these gamblers it's exactly how they'd talk.
